definition: to send/to mail/to entrust/to depend on/to attach oneself to/to live (in a house)/to lodge/foster (son etc)
item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

sentences.english: The gift was returned to its 70-something-year-old sender in the southern port city of Busan the same day.
sentences.chinese: 当日，这份礼物被退回给釜山市年逾七旬的寄件人。

sentences.english: And please write down the name and address of sender and receiver on the packing box.
sentences.chinese: 请在包装箱上写上寄件人和收件人的姓名和地址。

sentences.english: The parcel was returned to the sender because the directions were incorrect.
sentences.chinese: 包裹因姓名地址有误而退给了寄件人。

sentences.english: Article 23. Undeliverable postal materials shall be returned to the senders.
sentences.chinese: 第二十三条无法投递的邮件，应当退回寄件人。

sentences.english: There will be follow-up measures to guarantee the safety of senders' information.
sentences.chinese: 我们会采取一些后续措施来确保寄件人的信息安全。

sentences.english: Please fill in the form and sign your name in the column of "sender".
sentences.chinese: 请填写张张表格，然后在“寄件人”一栏内签名。

sentences.english: Where do I put the sender's and the receiver's address?
sentences.chinese: 我要在哪里填写寄件人和收件人的住址？

sentences.english: Undeliverable postal materials shall be returned to the senders.
sentences.chinese: 第二十三条无法投递的邮件，应当退回寄件人。

sentences.english: Be careful, make sure you know the sender before you open an email.
sentences.chinese: 小心，在你开信箱前要先确定那些寄件人是谁。

sentences.english: Please make sure your return address is correct.
sentences.chinese: 请确认您的寄件人地址是否正确。

sentences.english: Do not forward mails without permission of the sender.
sentences.chinese: 未得寄件人同意，请勿转寄他人信件。

sentences.english: Place a label or letterhead with sender's and recipidnt's addrdsses and phone numbersinside the psckage.
sentences.chinese: 建议在纸箱内贴入寄件人及收件人地址和电话标签。

sentences.english: Sender has the responsibility to ensure their mail items bear sufficient postage before posting.
sentences.chinese: 寄件人投寄邮件时有责任支付足够邮资。

sentences.english: Sorry, you have to ask the sender to make an inquiry at the office of origin.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，您得让寄件人在原寄局进行查询。

definition: to sign for the acceptance of sth (e.g. a delivery etc)
to reject (visa application etc)/(commerce) to return to sender/item returned to sender
